channel.title: [Delta] Hitpoints Reset
channel.description:
I have a small issue where my hitpoints reset after I logout. Basically if I get hurt I can just logout to heal myself. As far as I'm aware it's just not saving my hitpoints on logout. Prayer saves on logout, but I can't find out why or else I'd just copy that.
I checked other threads and they just said to save my currentHealth, but I don't know how or where to do that.

item.title: [Delta] Hitpoints Reset
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I answered you on rune-shit (server) already?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Hitpoints Reset
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Seeing how your Run Energy saves will help you. It also might be updating like that on purpose.

Read full topic
